post.author: Yuni
post.content:
supposedly, these images can indicate the level of stress one can handle...

The pictures attached are used to test the level of stress a person
can handle.

The slower the pictures move, the better your ability of handling stress. Alleged criminals that were tested see them spinning around madly; however, senior citizens and kids see them standing still.

None of these images are animated - they are perfectly static.
post.title: stress tests...
